product_name: Teva Terra Fi 4 Multisport Sandals - Men's
long_description: The latest interpretation of the classic Teva sport sandal, the Terra Fi 4 Multisport Sandals have a shock-absorbent heel, antimicrobial protection and Universal Strapping System for a good fit. Whether on the trail, in the desert or under water, the Terra Fi 4 sandals will continuously prove their rugged utility on world travels. A nylon shank keeps the foot stable and in control. Spider Original rubber is made to grip like crazy in wet environments. Open-toe construction doesn't allow water to pool. 3-point strap adjustment fine-tunes the fit and provides optimum support off-road or off-shore. Molded polyurethane midsole. Microban(R) zinc-based antimicrobial treatment keeps odors down. Teva Terra Fi 4 Multisport Sandals have soft Shoc Pads(TM) in the heels that give you serious shock absorption.
short_description: The latest interpretation of the classic Teva sport sandal, the Terra Fi 4 Multisport Sandals have a shock-absorbent heel, antimicrobial protection and Universal Strapping System for a good fit.
